dt: {bc}one who takes care of horses or mules
{bc}one who moves locomotives in and out of a roundhouse

et: Middle English {it}hostiller, osteler{/it} "innkeeper, servant at an inn attending horses, person keeping horses for hire" {ma}{mat|hosteler|}{/ma}
shortdef: one who takes care of horses or mules
one who moves locomotives in and out of a roundhouse; also : one who services locomotives
